act_summary: This section of the Companies Act, 2013 regulates the variation of contracts and objects in a prospectus. It requires approval or authority from the general meeting for such variations and mandates that details of the resolution be published in newspapers indicating the justification. The company is prohibited from using proceeds raised through a prospectus for buying other securities.
